alert.note: Alert for Loiza (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 08 at 7:47AM ADT until April 08 at 10:45AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Loiza and Rio Grande. * WHEN...Until 945 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and rivers. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 645 AM AST, Excessive runoff from previous rains in addition to ongoing thunderstorm activity will continue to result urban and stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
